about_the_game:
If you're going to be an immortal, you're going to need an immortal soundtrack.

Embrace the gladiator within! It's time to take hold of the Sounds and Sandals Immortals Official Soundtrack, featuring 31 epic tracks from the latest and greatest game in the Swords and Sandals series. Every track worthy of the gods of the arena. Music to lift your spirits to the heavens, send the heart pumping and set you off on your next training montage.

Including never-before heard music from the game of the same name, this collection will make you feel like a seven foot tall legendary warrior. Start your day with new mixes of classic tracks from Swords and Sandals Gladiator, Swords and Sandals III, Swords and Sandals Medieval, and more!

Own the Swords and Sandals Immortals Official Soundtrack today and make every event in your life that much more heroic.
